short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Coinverse offers fast and simple currency conversion for 160+ currencies with automatic detection and instant results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Coinverse offers the fastest and simplest currency conversion experience, supporting over 160 world currencies. With automatic detection of your primary currency and instant conversion, it’s the perfect tool for anyone dealing with international currencies.

Key feature:
✓ Instant currency conversion
✓ Supports 160+ currencies
✓ Automatically detects your primary currency using geolocation
✓ Convert multiple currencies at once
✓ Auto convert amounts by selecting them with your cursor
✓ Flexible settings to customize your default currency and widget
